templates.content: The width will vary slightly depending on the style of shoe/sole. Most of our shoes do tend to run on the wider side with exception of the tennis shoes.

templates.content: All online orders can take up to 3-7 business days from the date an order is placed, although Canada orders can take longer.

templates.content: The squeaker plugs should last the life of the shoe. We don't recommend the shoes be submerged in water or sand, and it's worth mentioning that some customers actually do choose to purchase additional replacement squeakers in the case they were to lose them when switching out the silent plugs/squeaker plugs.
templates.name: How long do the squeakers/squeaker plugs last?

templates.content: Yes it can. To remove the squeaker, use your fingers or a pair of tweezers to simply pull out the white button located near the heel of the shoe.
templates.name: Can the squeak be removed?

templates.content: Wee Squeak shoes will only sound if the child is walking in the correct heel-toe rotation. Please note that Squeaker sounds may vary. Be sure to never wear Wee Squeak shoes in sandboxes or at the beach. Sometimes the foam in the heel blocks the air from escaping the hole and prevents the squeaking. Remove the squeaker and place a ballpoint pen (or something similar) in the squeaker outlet. Push the foam towards the back of the shoe with the pen. This should fix the problem.
templates.name: Why don't my shoes squeak?
